aBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-E CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-S CAO-L

ant.aBody: O Hippolyte si credis in dominum Jesum Christum O Hippolyte si credideris in dominum Jesum Christum O Hippolyte si credas in dominum Jesum Christum et thesauros tibi ostendo et vitam aeternam promitto

verses.vBody: Si dictis facta compensas faciam quae hortaris
